formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'UnpauseMonitor' =-
[Synopsis] Unpause monitoring of a channel
[Description] UnpauseMonitor Unpauses monitoring of a channel on which monitoring had previously been paused with PauseMonitor.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,6 +4,6 @@ Unpause monitoring of a channel
[Description] - UnpauseMonitor + UnpauseMonitor(): Unpauses monitoring of a channel on which monitoring had previously been paused with PauseMonitor.
